# VEHICLE::SET_CARGOBOB_PICKUP_MAGNET_SET_AMBIENT_MODE

## Summary
Set the magnet to affect all objects and/or vehicles

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** cargobob
* **BOOL** affectsVehicles
* **BOOL** affectsObjects
